title: Napoleonic Wars
description: A series of major conflicts pitting the French Empire led by Napoleon Bonaparte against a varying array of European coalitions.

title: American Civil War
description: A civil war in the United States fought from 1861 to 1865.

title: World War I
description: A global war originating in Europe that lasted from 28 July 1914 to 11 November 1918.

title: World War II
description: A global war that lasted from 1939 to 1945, involving most of the world's nations.

title: Vietnam War
description: A conflict in Vietnam, Laos, and Cambodia from 1 November 1955 to the fall of Saigon on 30 April 1975.

title: Gulf War
description: A war waged by coalition forces from 35 nations led by the United States against Iraq in response to Iraq's invasion and annexation of Kuwait.
